common.name: _Name
common.topic-info: _to trigger the action on this node, do not forget the incoming 'msg' MUST contain a 'msg.topic' which is either 'state/__topicName__' (when used in read-only mode) or 'cmd/__topicName__' (when used in write mode), otherwise node will skip incoming message.
common.option-smartfilter-info:
_SmartFilter is enabled by default, making the node only triggering a new flow (aka output) when a state CHANGED after a MyHome BUS message was received.
This is made to avoid multiple flows starting for the same info/command, because MyHome sends the same message multiple times (for status request, response,...) 

Note: SmartFilter is never applied when node is running in read-only (status update request) mode.
common.option-skipevents-info: _If necessary, all MyHome status updates received from the gateway about this node can be ignored, which means only Node-RED received payloads will be processed.
common.option-readonly-checkbox: Only ask for current load status
common.option-readonly-info: _When enabled, the received payload (being 'ON', 'OFF', or whatever) is ignored and a status request is sent to gather current state without applying any change.
common.secondary-output-intro: _You may fine-tune the secondary output to better suit your needs when integrating with other node mechanisms (see node help for more info).
common.secondary-output-name-info: _Is the property name on the returned payload (i.e. payload.propertyname). When left empty, the payload is returned as a single value (i.e. not as an object)
